name: Ninja awakening
description:
Ninja awakening The hottest ninja action fighting RPG mobile game of 2020. You can play the 3 main protagonists, relive the classic plot, and find the original touch. From the first chapter -- the Ninja test --Shippuden, you can experience hearty ninjutsu Combat combos and full-screen secret technique

Ninjutsu Fighting，A THRILLING UNLIMITED COMBOS
All punch bits，feel the thrilling hits！Normal attacks combined with powerful ninjutsu to play UNLIMITED COMBOS, showing the uniqueness of each ninja and the subtle cooperation between ninjas! Classic ninjutsu cast at will, ultimate special effects, cool full screen!

Fair competition, strategy first
Pursue the fun of fair competition and enjoy real-time match up!From simple entertainment battles to high-end brain-burning competitions, diverse and exciting PVP gameplay puts the fun of strategy in the first place! Compete with many powerful enemies!

Make like-minded friends, fight side by side
Friendship first, Synergy first! Through a variety of social gameplay, such as guild, team dungeon, friend assistance and so on, you can make more like-minded friends and establish deep friendship!

powerful mounts,all-match fashion looks
Ninja Dog, Ninja Turtle, Toad, Tailed Beast... can all become your powerful mounts and show your strongest side! Each ninja also has a variety of all-match fashion looks! Come and show your unique charm personality!
